title: ASU 101 Executive Section Leader Student Worker
duties_responsibilities: Serve as a liaison and work in partnership with a larger academic structured support team
Communicate and provide student support to school-appointed/major-specific retention specialists, advisors, and faculty chairs
Assist Fulton faculty instructors in ASU 101 classes with collaborative learning activities
Serve as a mentor to ASU 101 Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering freshmen
Notify support team of classroom concerns and academic issues
Increase student involvement and encourage participation
Meet regularly with faculty members and support team
required_qualifications: Prior ASU 101 Section Leader experience and/or previous Executive Section Leader experience
preferred_qualifications: Undergraduate students with experience as a Section Leader for the Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering
Successful completion of the class for which they will work as a Section Leader in the Spring 2024 semester
Experience in ASU 101 Section Leader role
